'''''As the Lion Searched for Courage...''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the hidden {{Quest|Courage Is in the Heart}} in Sumeru.

==Trivia==
*The achievement title is a reference to the cowardly lion from the story, ''The Wizard of Oz''.
